name: Cultist
effect: Once your team loses 50% of their health, Galio is summoned, slamming into the largest cluster of enemies and knocking them up. Galio's strength increases based on the total star level of all active Cultists.

Daredevils seek the thrill of battle, dashing after every other attack. After every dash, they shield themselves for 20% of their max health and their next attack fires 2 shots, gaining Style. At max Style, they cast their spell. Base Style rank increases star level.

name: Divine

name: Dragonsoul
effect: The first Dragonsoul to take damage in combat recieves the Dragon's Blessing. While blessed, the unit gains bonus stats, and every 5th attack fires a Dragonsoul blast, dealing 40% of the target's maximum Health in magic damage. On death, this blessing passes to the closest Dragonsoul ally without a blessing.

When The Boss first drops below 40% health, he removes himself from combat to start doing sit-ups. Each sit-up restores 15% of his maximum health and gives him 40% Attack and Movement Speed. If he reaches full health he returns to combat Pumped Up, converting his basic attack and spell damage to True Damage. If all of his allies die, he will immediately return to combat.

name: Warlord
effect: Warlords have bonus Health and Spell Power. Each victorious combat they've participated in increases this bonus by 10%, stacking up to 5 times.
